As an AI language model, I don't have information on upcoming cultural festivals in your area specifically, but I can suggest a few general types of cultural festivals that take place throughout the year:

1. Music Festivals: Music festivals featuring international artists, traditional performances and cultural music are a great way to experience different cultures through music. Look for festivals that showcase cultural music from around the world.

2. Food Festivals: Festivals centered around food are also a great way to experience different cultures. Look for food festivals that feature a variety of options, including international cuisine.

3. Art Festivals: Art is a universal language that can help people connect across cultures. Art festivals, often showcase artworks made by different cultural groups or host exhibitions by international artists.

4. Religious Festivals: Different religious groups have their own cultural festivals, which often take place throughout the year. These can provide great insights into the beliefs, customs, and practices of different religions.

5. National Holidays: Every country has its own national holidays that celebrate important historical events, cultural traditions, or significant figures. Look up the dates for national holidays of different countries and attend events organized around them.

You can keep an eye on event listings in your city, explore cultural tourism websites, or check with the local tourist office for suggestions on upcoming cultural festivals in your area.
